name: Mercedes-Benz AMG A35
description: The price of Mercedes-Benz AMG A35, a 5 seater Sedan, starts from  of Rs. 58.00 Lakh. It is available in 1 variant, with an engine of 1991 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic.
